attributes.action: Allow for VAT rebate on costs incurred travelling to work.
attributes.additional_details: This could be simply calculated for fuel by using council tax information as well as a reference from employer about the number of days worked.
attributes.background: Travel to a place of work is an essential task for all members of society. Therefore there should be provision to allow for the refund of VAT placed on public transport fares and fuel used travelling from a place of residence to a place of work.
